Message:
“Pola, take care of things
while I’m gone.”

That’s what Leader Lucille told me,
before she headed to where Nebra
was waiting to make peace talks.

But, it was a location
humans had picked out...

No, I can’t think like this!
I already decided I’d believe
in Leader Lucille, didn’t I?!

If this’s what
Leader Lucille’s chosen,
it has to be right.

But then...
why do I feel so uneasy...?

I’m probably just anxious because
Leader Lucille’s not here.

It’s still only been
two days since she left...
I guess I really am
nothing without her...

Hesitantly peeking at
the commotion, I saw murky
bubbles floating in the air,
engulfing whatever they landed on.

The forest, the town...
even the people...
Everything they touched
began to melt away...
